title: HERS Diagnostic Output
description: A schema for detailed diagnostic outputs from RESNET Accredited HERS software tools.

schema_author.notes: Identifies the data model where the schema is defined

schema.notes: Identifies the schema used to define the data content

schema_version.description: Version of the root schema this data complies with

description.description: Description of data content (suitable for display)

timestamp.notes: Date/time of publication of this data.

id.notes: Assigned by *data publisher* to identify this data. `id` shall remain unchanged for revisions of the same data.

version.description: Integer version identifier for the data
version.notes: Used by *data publisher* to track revisions of the data. `data_version` shall be incremented for each data revision.

disclaimer.description: Characterization of accuracy, limitations, and applicability of this data

project_name.description: Name of the file or project used to generate this data

home_description.description: Supplementary descriptive information about the home

software_name.description: Name of the software used to generate this data

software_version.description: Version of the software used to generate this data

weather_data_location.description: Descriptive name of the weather data location
weather_data_location.notes: For example: City, town, or airport name.

hers_index.notes: Unrounded value based on the latest version of MINHERS

carbon_index.notes: Unrounded value based on the latest version of MINHERS

electricity_co2_emissions_factors.description: Regional emissions factors for electricity use

on_site_power_production.description: On-site power production (OPP) of the rated home

space_heating_system_output.description: Array of outputs for space heating systems

primary_fuel_type.description: System primary fuel type (needed to determine 'a' and 'b' coefficients for normalized energy consumption)

load.notes: Only required for systems of the HERS Reference Home

space_cooling_system_output.description: Array of outputs for space cooling systems

primary_fuel_type.description: System primary fuel type (needed to determine 'a' and 'b' coefficients for normalized energy consumption)

load.notes: Only required for systems of the HERS Reference Home
